generated_doNotEdit.title: Trade With Player Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the player to trade with this mob. When the goal starts, it will stop the mob's navigation.

fields.title: Filters
fields.description: Conditions that need to be met for the behavior to start.

fields.title: Max Distance From Player
fields.description: The max distance that the mob can be from the player before exiting the goal.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
